description.p: Targets can withstand the water spray by making a STR check vs. the attack roll.

gift_of_water.name: Gift of Water
gift_of_water.range: You call on the water spirits, who enchant all allies in a near area centered around you. As an action, they can unleash a forceful spray of water from an extended hand, dousing flames and pushing enemies straight back from close to near with a successful ranged attack roll.
